detectors.description: Which of the 14 detectors triggered on this event

phi.description: Angle between source location in azimuth measured from +x axis counterclockwise, to +y axis, range 0 - 360 degrees [deg]

theta.description: Angle between source location and LAT boresight, range 0 - 180 [deg]

trigger_algorithm.description: Version number of the flight software trigger algorithm that was used to calculate the trigger for this event

localization_algorithm.description: Version number of the flight software localization algorithm that was used to derive this location for this event

localization_url.description: String containing the full localization URL

lightcurve_url.description: String containing the full lightcurve URL

data_timescale.description: Binning (ie timesampling) of the countrate lightcurve used during the iterative location calculation phase of the processing [s]

latitude.description: Geographic latitude of Fermi at time of trigger [deg]

longitude.description: Geographic longitude of Fermi at time of trigger [deg]

earth_angle.description: Angle between the source location and the center of the Earth [deg]

spectral_class.description: Enum specifying classification of soft or hard spectral classification

duration_class.description: Enum specifying classification of short or long duration

reliability.description: Measure of confidence on the detection.  It is a number from 1 to 10. 2=low, 5=medium, 8=high

message_type.description: Specify the type of alert message, e.g. Alert, Flight Position, Ground Position [string]
